# For Voting_DApp README

In chapter1 Folder

- 1. node, npm install
```zsh
$npm install web3 -> npm install --no-audit
$npm install ganache-cli
$npm install solc@0.4.23

$node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli -> 10개의 이더리움 지갑 생성
```

- 2. new tab
``` zsh
$node
> Web3 = require('web3');
> web3 = new Web3(new Web3.providers.HttpProvider("http://localhost:8545"));
> web3.eth.accounts;
> web3.eth.getAccounts().then(console.log);
> web3.eth.getBalance('0xd11Cc77555D02181bc8dec0A7668b86Bf5007caa').then(console.log);
> web3.utils.fromWei('1', 'ether');
> .exit
```

- 3. Using Solidity and Remix IDE Make a Contract
Voting.sol 작성

- 4. Contract Complie
``` zsh
$node
> code = fs.readFileSync('Voting.sol').toString();
> solc = require('solc');
> compiledCode = solc.compile(code);

$node_modules/.bin.solcjs --bin --abi Voting.sol
```

``` zsh
$node
> Web3 = require('web3');
> web3 = new Web3(new Web3.providers.HttpProvider("http://localhost:8546"));
> abiDefinition = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./Voting_sol_Voting.abi').toString());
> deployedContract = new web3.eth.Contract(abiDefinition);
> bytecode = fs.readFile('./Voting_sol_Voting.bin').toString();
> deployedContract.deploy({
...         data:bytecode,
...         arguments: [['Rama', 'Nick', 'Jose'].map(name => web3.utils.asciiToHex(name))]
... }).send({
...         from: '0x3eB7aC12079BB39a38e0ffe23f6F6787d5B7DAF6',
...         gas: 1500000,
...         gasPrice: web3.utils.toWei('0.00003', 'ether')
... }).then((newContractInstance) => {
...         deployedContract.options.address = newContractInstance.options.address;
... })
> deployedContract.options.address;
> deployedContract.methods;
> deployedContract.methods.totalVotesFor(web3.utils.asciiToHex('Rama')).call().then((count) => colsole.log(count))
> 0
>  deployedContract.methods.voteForCandidate(web3.utils.asciiToHex('Rama')).send({from: '0x3eB7aC12079BB39a38e0ffe23f6F6787d5B7DAF6'}).then((f) => console.log(f))
Promise {
  <pending>,
  domain:
   Domain {
     domain: null,
     _events:
      [Object: null prototype] {
        removeListener: [Function: updateExceptionCapture],
        newListener: [Function: updateExceptionCapture],
        error: [Function: debugDomainError] },
     _eventsCount: 3,
     _maxListeners: undefined,
     members: [],
     [Symbol(kWeak)]: WeakReference {} } }
> { transactionHash:
   '0x849992708463207f0469831ef3623626ba6e9b2a00d1723818c852dfe6fab79e',
  transactionIndex: 0,
  blockHash:
   '0xb25dc845d71328a650b13ddf613f3a979326bc344f3aa515344aeb5e1139225e',
  blockNumber: 2,
  from: '0x3eb7ac12079bb39a38e0ffe23f6f6787d5b7daf6',
  to: '0x600cc5725f64ed370fd3dcb4b3d9dab535e391cc',
  gasUsed: 45995,
  cumulativeGasUsed: 45995,
  contractAddress: null,
  status: true,
  logsBloom:
   '',
  v: '0x25',
  r:
   '0xb29c4455b39fb8da8ff22efd7b5721884077d62b57de69a9e0f06d107452592b',
  s:
   '0x873415b22820219ba04fffa2dbfac5626294da8772b190eb267ec469edde94a',
  events: {} }
> deployedContract.methods.totalVotesFor(web3.utils.asciiToHex('Rama')).call().then((count) => console.log(count))
> 1
> .exit
```


- 5. FrontEnd
index.html, index.js 작성
```zsh
$sudo npm install -g http-server
$http-server
```
